name: Edesign
short_description:
Edesign is a deisgn tool for Eprimer, Eprobe and general probe based on Primer3. 
Eprimer and Eprobe are recently developed labeled DNA oligomers containing commonly one thymidine having two covalently linked thiazole orange dye moieties. 

Edesign provides the optimal primer and probe sequences and the dye-labeling position from user-input target sequence. 
Edesign provides the genotyping mode which designs the internal probe over a user-specified target variant e.g. (SNP, insert/deletion, somatic mutation etc) for genotyping. 
The default setting of the conditional parameters and weights were set as efficient for selecting Eprimer and Eprobe. 

The Edesign software is especially suited for PCR applications but can also be used for other applications to design Eprobe/Eprimer. 
Edesign has improved internal probe design functions, which are also beneficial for other techniques employing an other internal probe.
summary: Design tool for Eprimer, Eprobe and general probe
